Privacy Policy

Last updated: 2026

Proton Field is an entertainment experience. We do not claim medical or therapeutic benefit.

What We Collect

  • Inputs you provide: prompts/choices and optional selfie uploads for image generation.
  • Technical data: basic device/usage metadata collected by our hosting platform for performance and security.

What We Donâ€™t Collect

  • No account creation or login is required for the free experience.
  • No email is required to use the free portion.
  • No behavioral ads; we do not sell personal information.

How We Use Data

  • Generate images and explanations for your session.
  • Operate and secure the service.

Selfies and Image Data

  • Selfies are sent to our image processor (Modelslab API) only to blend into the requested output.
  • We do not retain selfies after a successful render and do not use them for any other purpose.
  • Avoid uploading sensitive images or personal data.

Sharing

  • Vendors: Modelslab (image generation) and hosting providers as needed to run the app.
  • We do not sell your personal information.

Retention

Session data is kept only as needed to generate images. Selfies are deleted after successful generation.

Security

We use TLS in transit and limit data sent to vendors. No security practice is perfect; use at your discretion.

Your Rights (CCPA/CPRA and US)

  • You may request access or deletion of personal information we hold. Contact us to submit requests.
  • We do not sell or share personal information for cross-context behavioral advertising.

Children

Not intended for users under 16. Do not use if you are under the applicable age threshold.

Contact

Email: legal@protonfield.app
